remarks: Any translation belongs to the set of functions constructed for ~ cdleme .  TODO:  Fix comment.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Apr-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdlemg1c.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg1c.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg1c.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg1c.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg1cN $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ ( F ` P ) = Q ) -> ( F e. T <-> F = ( iota_ f e. T ( f ` P ) = Q ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ f $.
$d A f $.
$d F f $.
$d H f $.
$d K f $.
$d P f $.
$d Q f $.
$d T f $.
$d W f $.
